channel.title: baby fever on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in baby fever on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Sixth month
item.description: (17thJune - 16thJuly) After rice ceremony at Siliguri we finally came to Bangalore. This time he was fine both in train and plane. We stayed in service apartment for 3 nights till our things moved to our rented apartment. Too many changes of weather, locations and little less careÂ Aarush got high fever for the first time and we had to rush him to Manipal. When it settled we started to strolled within our apartment complex to know our neighborhood more.
